---
title: "PressKeyAction"
description: "Press a keyboard key: e"
---

g. 'Enter', 'Backspace', 'Insert', 'Delete', etc.

**Example:**
```python
from notte_core.actions import PressKeyAction
# Dict syntax
session.execute({"type": "press_key", "key": "Enter"})
# Pydantic syntax
session.execute(PressKeyAction(key="Enter"))
```

</ParamField>

</ParamField>

<ParamField path="key" type="str" required>
</ParamField>
